name: CATastrophe (Yamartim, Felipe Lépore de Macedo Borges, 2dlucas, Kyuchi)
name_original: CATastrophe (Yamartim, Felipe Lépore de Macedo Borges, 2dlucas, Kyuchi)
description:
(yes the white rectangle on the menu was supposed to be a logo, oops!)

Luck is against you! And all you got is dice!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Click to shoot dice
  • R to shake your dice tube 

You are a little black cat that wants revenge against all things that are lucky! But they'll fight back... The key to survival is your dice gun!

The number on each dice represents how much damage it'll do.

Press R to shake your dice tube and get different values! You might do more damage... But you could also make the your dice worse... 

Keep an eye on the different dice shapes on your tube! 

Each type of dice has a different range of values of damage it can do, shake the bigger dice for bigger numbers!

Are you running out of dice? 

Grab the ones dropped by dead enemies, they also heal your hp!

How long can you survive against the forces of luck?? Post your high score in the comments!

This little game was made in 48 hours as a submission to the GMTK game jam 2022, thank you for playing it!
